commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Hm? What's this...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Wait, to Otonokizaka?!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: What's wrong, Ayumu?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I just got a text that our club president went to go see Maki and them in person.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What?! So no one's going to watch us practice today?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: It must be that important. We'll have to do without an audience.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I hope it wasn't too much trouble...

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm worried. Rina-chan Board says, "Slump."

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: E-Everything's going to be okay...right?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Don't look so concerned, guys. She has to figure it out alone.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes. Karin is right. Let's hope it's a satisfying answer.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: But will she be okay? She seemed worried for a while.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah. Sometimes when you're stuck and think too much, you just get fed up.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Considering how all this worry came from the contest with Maki, talking with her in person is the best course of action.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah. You're probably right.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I'm sure she'll come back feeling revived, refreshed, and ready for action.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: ...R-Right?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Even Ai is worried about it! All we can do is believe and wait. Although to be honest, I'm worried too.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I've never seen our president worry so much before.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: You're her childhood friend, Ayumu. Does she let trouble really drag her down?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Don't tell me she's the type to get all depressed and not eat my delicious bread?!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Has it happened before?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Ayumu, answer!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Sheesh, don't rush me down like that.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I didn't think of everyone in Nijigasaki when I composed. That's why it didn't feel right.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (The song I made by listening and researching 's' music showed off my technique and it was my declaration of war against 's.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (If all I was thinking about was 's, it's no wonder I can't picture Nijigasaki singing it. I made it for them, but didn't think about them at all.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I need to get to know everyone in the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club even better. I'll know them better and think of them while I make our next song!)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (*Sigh* I really want to see everyone right now.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh? What're all of you doing here? Last bell rung a long time ago!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What?! We should be asking you the same thing!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh. I, uhh...

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I heard you went to Otonokizaka! How was it?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wh-What do you mean?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Karin, don't just pop off with questions like that!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Karin was terribly worried about you, though.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: So were you, Emma!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sorry, everyone. I didn't mean to make you worry.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: It's fine. So did you clear your mind after going back to Otonokizaka?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: You went to get some advice on composing from Maki, right? Did you gain anything?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: You know, we wanted to help you with your problems, too.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: We might not be as helpful as 's though.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: That may be true, but we could have made you smile with some of Ai's famous puns.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yeah. We were trying to think of how to cheer you up so hard that we didn't notice it was time to go home.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: We decided to keep talking here, but we didn't think we'd run into you.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: You look a bit better now. You had a good talk with 's, didn't you?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I actually figured something out talking to 's today. I'm glad I ran into you all, because I wanted to talk to you guys about it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I felt the song I wrote for the contest against Maki was pretty good.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But I couldn't picture you guys singing it. I could picture 's singing Maki's song on stage though.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That's not true. I wanted to sing your song!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thanks, Kasumi. I figured out the difference between our songs. So, the next song I write will be much better.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What was the difference you found?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Picturing the singers when you write! All I was thinking about when writing my last song was that I had to write a great song like 's.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That wasn't good enough though. My song was for all of you, so I should have been imagining you guys singing and dancing to it on stage.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I love everyone in the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. I want to rewrite the song for you to all sing.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So, I want to get to know all of you even better!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Giggle* You didn't need us to cheer you up after all.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: That's our club president! You're so reliable!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes, that's right.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: If something makes you all depressed again, talk to us about it first.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah, come to us. We want to help you.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: We can solve any problem quickly if we work on it together.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You're right! Thanks everyone!
